text: Metohija is a region in the southwestern part of Kosovo. Metohija may also refer to: *Autonomous Province of Kosovo and Metohija, autonomous province that Serbia claims to still have under its sovereignty **Autonomous Region of Kosovo and Metohija (1945–1963), autonomous region in the People's Republic of Serbia **Autonomous Province of Kosovo and Metohija (1963–1968), autonomous province in the Socialist Republic of Serbia *Metohija (Ston), village near Ston, Croatia *, village near Podujevo, Kosovo ==See also== *
title: Metohija (disambiguation)
